description: [``botocore``] Enable MACSec support and features on Interconnects.
[``botocore``] Add support for native anomaly detection in IoT SiteWise using new Computation Model APIs
[``botocore``] Add Pipeline Role Arn as an optional parameter to the create / update pipeline APIs as an alternative to passing in the pipeline configuration body

[``botocore``] Updates legacy token auth flow to check if cached legacy tokens are expired according to the local clock. If expired, it will raise an ``UnauthorizedSSOTokenError`` instead of sending an expired token to Identity Center's ``GetRoleCredentials`` API.
